all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But little children are holy, being sanctified through the atonement of Jesus Christ; and this is what the scriptures mean.
Doctrine and Covenants 74:7
Quote of the Day
"The formal organization of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints was the culmination of a sequence of miraculous experiences."
Elder David A. Bednar | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
